ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) pouch Progresso™ Recipe Starters™ fire roasted tomato cooking sauce
instructions: Mix cooking sauce, mustard and Worcestershire sauce in 3-quart saucepan.
Heat to simmering over medium-high heat. Stir in chicken. Reduce heat to medium; simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve chicken mixture on buns. Top each with coleslaw.
title: Pulled Chicken Sandwiches
